overview:
Maisy Ng co-founded Add Partners with more than 10 yearsâ€™ technology and venture capital experience that spans Asian, American and European markets. Maisy was most recently a Senior Manager at Vertex Management, the Singapore-based multinational private equity firm. Maisy was part of the pioneering team that established Vertexâ€™s European operations and headed their European office in London. During the prior eight years, Maisy worked in the semiconductor industry, where she was a chip designer in Silicon Valley and Singapore before moving into Product Marketing. Maisy is named as a co-inventor in six US technology patents.

Maisy is Singaporean. She holds a BASc in Electrical Engineering from the University of Toronto; a MSc in Electrical Engineering from the California Institute of Technology; and a MSc in Management of Technology from the National University of Singapore.

Maisy serves on the Board of Directors of SurfKitchen, Navio and Arieso.
